poem:
**Remote Control**

Lynch, cloaked in smoke, 
sends his visions 
through cables, 
wire whispers 
of darkness and light 
finding their way 
into our living rooms, 
his breath 
now a ghost 
haunting 
the frames 
of our dreams.
